alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 1:33AM CDT until May 06 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ST. TAMMANY PARISH IN SOUTHEASTERN LOUISIANA AND SOUTHWESTERN HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 133 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Shoreline Park, or 7 miles west of Waveland, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pearlington. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 9. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
